Translations.Text: And He it is Who has created for you the hearing, and the eyes and the hearts. Very little it is what you pay thanks
And He it is Who has scattered you on the earth and to Him you shall be gathered back
And He it is Who gives life and causes death. And to Him (is the source of the) alternation of the night and the day. Will you then not use intellect
Nay, they uttered the like of what said the earlier (misled) people
They said: “Whether, when we died and we became dust and bones; whether, indeed we will be surely those who have been raised to a new life
Verily, indeed this we have been promised, we and our fathers, since before. It is not but the written material of the earlier people.”
Say: “Whose is the earth and whosoever is therein? If you had been knowing!”
Soon they will say: “For Allah!” Say: “Will you then not remind (your ownself, and others)?”
Say: “Who is the Nourisher-Sustainer of the seven (many) heavens, and (the) Nourisher-Sustainer of the Great throne?”
Soon they will say: “For Allah.” Say: “Will you not then pay obedience (to Him Alone)?”
Say: “Who (it is) — in His hand is the sovereignty (or the dominion) of all things, and He protects (His creations) and one is not given protection against Him — if you know
Soon they will say: “For Allah.” Say: “Then to what you are being led under the effect of sorcery?”
Nay, We have come to them with Al-Haqq, and verily, they are liars

Allah has not begotten any son; and there is not along with Him any ilah, otherwise then, each god would have moved apart with what he had created and surely, some of them would have gone against some (others). Allah be Glorified against all that they fabricate (against His Majesty)
Aware of the unseen and the seen! Exalted be He above all that they associate as partners (to Him)
